hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout on Regime Shift to Bull
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market is in NEUTRAL regime (confidence >90%) and BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% while the 5-day average daily range compresses to <2.5%, a breakout above the 20-day Bollinger Band upper band (2 std) on >1.5x average volume will signal an imminent transition to BULL regime, with the move sustaining for at least 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low volatility in neutral markets often precedes significant directional moves. A high-conviction volume breakout from compression suggests institutional accumulation and regime change initiation. The Bollinger Band breakout provides a clear technical signal.
entry_conditions: BTC price closes > 20-day Bollinger Band upper band (2 std)
Volume on breakout day > 1.5x 20-day average volume

exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of such breakouts fail to sustain beyond 2 days or result in immediate reversal below the 20-day SMA, indicating false breakouts rather than true regime transitions.
